IAP View

To handle payment, e.g. if the user doesn't own this song and wants to purchase it, I would use the Google in-app billing library: https://developer.android.com/google/play/billing/billing_library.html

First it seems like I'd have to use the querySkuDetailsAsync method, followed by the onSkuDetailsResponse method.

To purchase an item it looks like I need the launchBillingFlow method, which will automatically let the user know if the transaction was successful with onPurchasesUpdated.
